name: ORI.KAMI
description:
ORI.KAMI is a top down RPG (for WebGL and PC) with a twist. You can collect paper to fold origami and use them in battles and world exploration.

If you'd like to play the game in browser, you can check out the creators' game page here: https://rainbowmushroom.itch.io/orikami. Game works best in Firefox or Edge.
